DAIRY QUEEN WI , 2500 N MAYFAIR RD # M149 , 53226 MILWAUKEE | (414) 476-0946 Experience Something Different DQ com provides a restaurant locator, menus with nutritional information, franchise details, company history and news Dairy Queen is an international franchise THIRTY-ONE BASKIN-ROBBINS ICE CREAM STORES WI , 8820 NORTH PORT WASHINGTON ROAD , 53217 MILWAUKEE | 001 (414) 352-1020 ice cream&frozen yogurt shops, shop, shops, shop DAIRY QUEEN WI , 301 EAST SCHOOL ROAD , 53217 MILWAUKEE | 001 (414) 962-9440 That's why the Dairy Queen system has been a proud national sponsor of Children's Miracle Network (CMN) since 1984. During the past 25 years, Dairy Queen operators throughout the United States and Canada have raised more than $77 million for CMN. From collecting customers' pocket change, to selling paper Miracle Balloons and holding special events, our support enables us to give something back to the communities in which we do business.
